title: Learn
content: The [more|most] you learn, the more you earn.

title: Sooner
content: The earlier you leave, the [sooner|soon] you arrive.
explanationZhTw: 在 'the...the...' 句型中使用比較級。
explanationZhCn: 在 'the...the...' 句型中使用比较级。

title: Tired
content: He was [so|such] tired that he slept immediately.

title: Lovely
content: It was [such|so] a lovely day that we went out.

title: Coffee
content: This coffee is [too|enough] hot to drink.
explanationZhTw: 'Too' 暗示過度而無法進行某動作。
explanationZhCn: 'Too' 暗示过度而无法进行某动作。

title: Enough
content: He is strong [enough|too] to lift it.

title: English
content: He speaks [not only|only] English but also French.
explanationZhTw: 用於增加資訊的關聯連接詞。
explanationZhCn: 用于增加资讯的关联连词。

title: Rather
content: I would rather stay home [than|to] go out.

title: Take
content: It [takes|costs] me 20 minutes to walk there.

title: Cost
explanationEnUs: Use 'costs' for price/money involving an object subject.

title: Spend
explanationZhTw: 人 'spend' (花費) 時間或金錢。
explanationZhCn: 人 'spend' (花费) 时间或金钱。

title: Box
content: The box is [so|such] heavy that I can't lift it.

title: Either
content: You can [either|neither] have cake or ice cream.

title: Neither
content: The solution is [neither|either] simple nor cheap.
